title: This Tiny Printer Uses Zero Ink
description: HP Sprocket -   This little gadget is called the HP Sprocket. It's a portable printer capable of instantly printing from either your camera roll or straight from social media. It works with either iPhone or Android.  From the manufacturer -  With the HP Sprocket Photo Printer, print photos from your smartphone or tablet as easily as you post them. Make time with friends more memorable with instantly sharable 2 x 3-inch (5 x 7.6 cm) snapshots or stickers of every fun-filled moment.  This video was sponsored by HP.  FOLLOW ME IN THESE PLACES FOR UPDATES Twitter -  Facebook -  Instagram -  Google Plus -
